ModMetaData.name: Resource Readout Improvements
ModMetaData.author: Saucy_Pigeon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds some improvements to the resource readout:
- Now remembers which tabs you had open if you reload a save. - Clicking on a resource selects all available in your stockpiles. - "Foods" category is no longer open by default for no reason whatsoever.
Compatible with save games and mods that add their own ThingCategories.
